NewsItem.HEADLINE: Cellular IoT Devices Annual Market Study 2019 (PDF) with Forecast (Excel File)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Technical and cost comparisons for 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G IoT devices, a from GSM/GPRS to LTE-M, NB-IoT, and 5G IoT. Market share, shipment, pricing, and revenue data are included with a ten-year forecast for growth in key areas.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The detailed forecast breaks down several applications, device technologies, and trends in each level of the ecosystem. Service revenue for operators is covered, as well as device revenue, module revenue, and semiconductor revenue for a complete picture of the ecosystem through 2029.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: NB-IoT 5G IoT LTE-M eMTC Cat-M1 Cat-M2 Cat-NB1 Cat-NB2 Cat-4 Cat-13 Cat-18 Cat-20 LTE GPRS EDGE HSPA CDMA Cellular IoT CIOT C-IoT
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-C-IOT-19 rev0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-C-IOT-19 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
